name: CMLIT 191N Final Project (The Simulation)
description: Developed by Group 8 (Zach, Anand, Xavier, John) in the Fall 2021 semester of CMLIT 191N at Penn State, this game is the final project of the class. Take control of your character and embark on an adventure to save the world by collecting artifacts across the area. Overcome challenges to get each artifact and in the process, learn a little bit more about how video games relate to everyday issues. Maybe even find all 5 (only 4 for beta) easter eggs in the game!
